snippet: Heavy rains and flash flooding throughout the Southwest washed away portions of Interstate 15 in Nevada, prompting state officials to close a nearly 50-mile stretch between Las Vegas and Salt Lake City.
abstract: Nevada state officials close nearly 50-mile stretch of Interstate 15 between Las Vegas and Salt Lake City, after heavy rains and flooding throughout the Southwest washes away portions of the major trucking artery.
lead_paragraph: Heavy rains and flash flooding throughout the Southwest washed away portions of Interstate 15 in Nevada, prompting state officials to close a nearly 50-mile stretch between Las Vegas and Salt Lake City.

headline.main: Nevada: Flooding Shuts Stretch of Interstate
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Flooding Shuts Stretch of Interstate
